basicInfo.name: Lina
basicInfo.flavor: Through her performances, Lina developed a greater understanding of the Yin and Yang. Deemed a worthy descendant of Cheong Myung, she was given the title of Strings of the Heart.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Heals HP equal to 7% of the caster's Max HP.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 7% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 1.name: Marching Anthem
Skill 1.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 21% of the caster's Max HP.
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes equal to 24% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 2.name: Inspiring Melody
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Front Row Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Damage Boost to 28%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To All Enemies
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 41%.

Passive.name: Dissonance
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Effect Resist Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 39% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Effect Resist Boost to 34%.
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 45% of Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - All Allies
 - Adds Effect: 34% Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Performances, songs, yin and yang, harmony, quality instruments, tea ceremony, tea, neatness
profile.dislikes: The Power of Destruction the Seven Knights possess, things that go against harmony, bad smells
profile.story: Through her performances, Lina developed a greater understanding of the Yin and Yang. Deemed a worthy descendant of Cheong Myung, she was given the title of Strings of the Heart.

basicInfo.name: Lina
basicInfo.flavor: Lina believes that music has the capability of moving the hearts of all creations. Lina's moving performance earned her the title of Sonorous Exorcist during her adventure.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Marching Anthem
Skill 1.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 19% of the caster's Max HP.
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Inspiring Melody
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Front Row Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Dissonance
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Effect Resist Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 35% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Effect Resist Boost to 22%.

profile.likes: Performances, songs, yin and yang, harmony, quality instruments, tea ceremony, tea, neatness

profile.story: Lina believes that music has the capability of moving the hearts of all creations. Lina's moving performance earned her the title of Sonorous Exorcist during her adventure.

basicInfo.name: Lina
basicInfo.flavor: As a descendant of the legendary Yin-Yang Master Cheong Myung, Lina has a superb understanding of the yin-yang arts, and is also savvy with musical instruments. As such, she has the unusual ability to use their sounds to manipulate yin and yang.

 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

 - Front Row Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

All Allies

 - Self
